Key Arguments: The bill may lead to overreach and censorship, threatening free speech.

The bill lacks necessary safeguards to prevent potential abuses of power.
The exclusion of the government from the rules undermines equality and fairness.
Exempting the government from the rules could erode public trust and democracy.
Main Themes: Need for equal application of laws
